name: Winter to spring and moments in between
description:
Creation from Michel Bertrand, digital abstractionist from France.

I've created this artwork in March 2021. In the alps, at 1500 meters of altitude. This is the time of the year when winter is still present and when your heart craves the green grass from imminent spring.

You look down in the valley and wish for warmer temperatures soon.

This creation is a reminder to always live in the moment, no matter where you are in your life. There's an immense charm to winter and in spring but no less than the multitude of moments in between.


"I create artworks to express my emotions and make people think about how to become a better version of themselves."

"I believe in clean NFTs and love the Tezos community"
